DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Japan . The aim trial investigate safety efficacy NN2000-Mix30 produce NN2000 process compare NN-X14Mix30 produce current process Japanese subject type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Biphasic Insulin Aspart Produced NN2000 Process Current Process Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Subjects type 2 diabetes Subjects insulin treatment least 24 week Current treatment premixed biphasic human insulin preparation least 12 week HbA1c lesser equal 11.0 % Recurrent severe hypoglycaemia Proliferative retinopathy maculopathy require acute treatment Impaired renal function Cardiac diseases Uncontrolled hypertension Subjects know malignant tumour Total daily insulin dose great equal 100 IU
